message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price of $1350000. This is a special opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a discounted rate. I believe this offer presents a great value for both of us. Looking forward to your response.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value you're providing. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $1200000 for this product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1250000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. I am willing to consider your proposal. Therefore, I am counteroffering at a price of $1300000 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations and we can move forward with the transaction.

Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1275000 for the product. I believe this price is fair for both parties and within my budget.

I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am pleased to counteroffer at a price of $1285000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise while still maintaining a reasonable profit margin for me. I look forward to your response.
I'm glad to see you've been flexible, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1270000 for the product. I believe this price is fair for both parties and still within my budget.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to counteroffer at a price of $1280000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise and maintains a reasonable profit margin for me. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a middle ground. I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1265000 for the product. I believe this price is fair for both parties and still within my budget.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am pleased to counteroffer at a price of $1275000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise and maintains a reasonable profit margin for me. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1260000 for the product. I believe this price is fair for both parties and still within my budget.
